location: Near Grand Hotel (圓山大飯店), Shilin
notes: Very clean, modern renovated apartment with new cabinetry, recessed lighting, and modern appliances including AC and refrigerator. Good natural light from multiple windows. Baby safety concerns: glass coffee table with sharp corners needs childproofing, but no visible balcony or stairs. View of Grand Hotel and MRT line suggests convenient location near Yuanshan area.
